extendedInfo.description: As a Copart member, you now have the ability to access and manage your account wherever you go!  Use your Android to search through our inventory of over 50,000 vehicles, view vehicle condition reports, create lists of your favorite cars, and even manage and place bids.

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: Can login , can\'t see pictures, can\'t see lot details, sometimes shows inventory, sometimes doesn\'t, please fix would love to bid from my phone.
reviews.author: Donald Stevens

reviews.comment: THE ONLY THING I CAN DO WITH THIS APP IS LOG IN. I CAN\'T WATCH ANY PICTURES OR LOT INFORMATION OR BID. PLEASE FIX THIS PROBLEMS ASAP. HTC SENSATION
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Wasted my time downloading this app, can\'t log in, if lucky to log in can\'t view inventory or even bid live.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy S4
reviews.comment: This app is no good. Wish they would fix the problem so I can look at pics and bid on the cars
reviews.author: Daniel Kovacs

reviews.title: Dont download
reviews.comment: App sucks, doesnt work and unable to login. Needs serious work.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Worst app I\'ve ever seen. Doesn\'t load lot photos, highlights, details... Poopy poo
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cant bid on phone
reviews.comment: Rather buy here, but cant bid.  Horrible.   iaai mobile isnt great, but worlds better than this
reviews.author: Ed M

reviews.title: Wont let open live
reviews.comment: Cannot open luve auction on mobile would be nice to watch and bid live from mobile phone. Other than that works fine
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This App on Apple much better, you can wath and bid there. But this one useless.
reviews.author: Vlad P.

reviews.title: No good on HTC EVO 4G
reviews.comment: No stars! Won\'t do anything on my evo. Sucks, please fix glitches
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Can\'t login
reviews.comment: Horrible soft. Can\'t logon. Srarch doesn\'t work, can\'t choose cat modrl, aftet selecting make. Just lodt time and space on my phone
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Horrible
reviews.comment: This app should be branded salvage its like a lot of American made cars ........junk
reviews.author: Chad Lowrance

reviews.title: its garbage
reviews.comment: every time i click on an item it tells me that an internal error occurred whats the point of having it then
reviews.author: Mark Nano

reviews.title: Nice app
reviews.comment: Works almost as good as the full site.
reviews.author: Josh Stultz

reviews.title: This app is terrible!
reviews.comment: You seach for a certain car then search for a different one it merges the two searches all the time when yoy click on the next page of views.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Update
reviews.comment: It works better then before, now we just need capability to bid over the phone!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good tool
reviews.comment: It\'s a good tool for the modest buyer I mainly use this app to scout cars and when I find one I like I just go the computer.  Good app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Sale list browsing with this app is horrible, slow and not to many options. This is very poorly written app!!! Please fix it. Maybe try from scratch.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bad...
reviews.comment: Icant bid on vehicles just look at them ... So not very helpful
reviews.author: tAlex Fernandez

reviews.title: Don\'t even download this crap
reviews.comment: Can\'t login, can\'t view details or images , can\'t bid. You can\'t do anything. No idea why copart makes such a crap available in the playstore. Did the app programed your local forklift driver?
reviews.author: Yves Lenhard
